listeningQuestion.question: What surprising information did Kate reveal about Carlos?
listeningQuestion.translation: 凯特透露了关于卡洛斯什么令人惊讶的信息？

editorNotes: 本课继续通过新闻采访和报道的对比，深入展示了情态动词may、might和would的用法，以及直接引语转换为间接引语时的时态变化。课文还介绍了如何报道婚姻相关新闻，这些表达方式在新闻写作和社交场合都很实用。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
notes: Reporter:        Are you really going to retire, Miss marsh?
Miss Marsh:    I may. I can't make up my mind. I shall have to ask my future husband. He won't let me make another film.
Reporter:        Your future husband, Miss Marsh?
Miss Marsh:   Yes. Let me introduce him to you. His name is Carlos. We are going to get married next week.
Kate:             Look, Millie!    Here's another report about Karen Marsh. Listen:

"Karen Marsh: The Latest. At her London Hotel today Miss Marsh told reporters she might retire. She said she couldn't make up her mind. She said she would have to ask her future husband. She said her future husband would not let her make another film. Then she introduced us to Carlos and told us they would get married next week."
Millie:             That's sensational news, isn't it, Kate?
Kate:It certainly is. He'll be her sixth husband!

notesOnText.heading: 课文详注 Further notes on the text

notes.heading: 1. 可能性表达
children: 核心概念：如何表达不确定性
- I can't make up my mind 我拿不定主意
- I might retire 我可能要退休
使用场景：表达不确定的计划时
注意事项：注意语气的委婉性

notes.heading: 2. 婚姻相关表达
children: 核心概念：如何讨论婚姻计划
- going to get married 准备结婚
- Let me introduce him 让我介绍他
使用场景：讨论婚姻话题时
注意事项：注意表达的礼貌性

notes.heading: 3. 新闻报道转述
children: 核心概念：如何转述新闻内容
- introduced us to 把...介绍给我们
使用场景：转述新闻报道时
注意事项：注意时态和人称的变化

notes.heading: 4. 惊讶表达
children: 核心概念：如何表达惊讶
- That's sensational news 这是条轰动的消息
使用场景：对新闻表示惊讶时
注意事项：注意语气的真实性

grammarNotes.heading: 语法要点 Grammar in use

notes.heading: 1. may和might的用法
children: 1. 表示可能性：I may retire → she might retire
3. 用于间接引语时的变化
4. 例句：I may go → She said she might go

notes.heading: 2. would表示将来
children: 1. 用于间接引语中的将来：will → would
4. 例句：We will get married → She said they would get married

notes.heading: 3. be going to的间接引语
children: 1. 表示计划：are going to → were going to
4. 例句：We are going to get married → She said they were going to get married

notes.heading: 2. 新闻相关词汇
children: - the latest news 最新消息

notes.heading: 3. 介绍相关词汇
children: - introduce someone to 把某人介绍给
